heading: Speaking to Council
text: Contact Us City of Kingston City Hall 216 Ontario Street Kingston, ON K7L 2Z3 Canada contactus@cityofkingston.ca Phone: 613-546-0000 The City of Kingston acknowledges that we are on the traditional homeland of the Anishinabek, Haudenosaunee, and the Huron-Wendat, and thanks these nations for their care and stewardship over this shared land. Today, the City is committed to working with Indigenous peoples and all residents to pursue a united path of reconciliation. Learn more about the City's reconciliation initiatives .
